name: Key Finder (danmart)
description:
-This is the first game created by Studio D at the EGD Collective exploration program

-All you have to do is break the grass and find keys in order to  reach the bars of gold

-Press SPACE to roll 

-Press E to slash and break the grass

-You can use WASD or Arrow Keys to move

*Disclaimer, the textures were not made by Studio D, Credit goes to HeartBeast
